ComicInfo.Title: Mork and Mindy; Cracked's Guide for Spotting Self-Lovers; The Villain; A Cracked Look at Phobias; Special Interest and Digest Magazines; Cracked's New Soon-to-Be-a-Fad Diets; Cracked Takes a Look at the Big Cats of the Big Top; Testimonial Ads, the Way They Should Be; The Cracked Guide to Horseback Riding; Your Dentist Is Your Friend; Phone Services of the Future; Lue Grunt; Cracked Interviews the Health Nut King; Cracked Shut-Ups; Jomo Umgawa Invents Having the Neighbors Over for Dinner
ComicInfo.Summary:
Satire of "Mork and Mindy."
Spoof of television series "Lou Grant."
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 22:44:52. [Issue ID 250519]
ComicInfo.Penciller: John Severin,Howard Nostrand,Val Mayerik,Warren Sattler,Don Orehek,Bill Ward
ComicInfo.Inker: John Severin,Howard Nostrand,Val Mayerik,Warren Sattler,Don Orehek,Bill Ward
